episodes.description: Heather welcomes Kasia Urbaniak to the podcast, a former dominatrix turned women's empowerment teacher. Kasia talks about her experience as a dominatrix and how she applies that experience to other aspects of her life. She also reveals tips and tricks on how to break conditioning that stops us from listening to our inner voice.

episodes.description: Dr. Drew Pinsky joins Heather to talk about grief and why it's human nature to avoid it but why it's important to talk about. Dr. Drew also discusses the effects of lockdown on addiction and how the exposure to pornography is having profound consequences for adolescence.
